result.reason: Right shift key not recognized due to missing extended key flag handling in RDP keyboard input — right-side modifier keys require the extended key bit to distinguish them from their left counterparts.
result.approach: In the RDP keyboard event handler, check for extended key flag (e.KeyValue == 0xA1 or e.Modifiers check) to ensure right shift (VK_RSHIFT) is sent with the correct virtual key code rather than being collapsed into generic VK_SHIFT.
